mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_gnpz (id, name, pxh, sbpz, isdel, lrsj, lrr_sfzh, xgsj, xgr_sfzh,gnpz,sfkbj,zdypz) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pxh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sbpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfkbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdypz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_xt_gnpz set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pxh = #{pxh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sbpz = #{sbpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lrr_sfzh = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgsj = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgr_sfzh = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnpz = #{gnpz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfkbj = #{sfkbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zdypz = #{zdypz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, pxh, sbpz, isdel, lrsj, lrr_sfzh, xgsj, xgr_sfzh,gnpz,sfkbj,zdypz from chas_xt_gnpz where 1 = 1 and isdel = 0

select a.id, a.name, a.pxh, a.sbpz, a.isdel, a.lrsj, a.lrr_sfzh, a.xgsj, a.xgr_sfzh, a.gnpz, a.sfkbj ,a.zdypz from chas_xt_gnpz a left join chas_xt_baqconfig b on a.id = b.gnpzid where b.baqid = '${baqid}' and isdel = 0
